description: Number of labeled n-node 4-valent graphs containing 3 double edges, a distinguished unordered pair of which are adjacent.
references: R. C. Read and N. C. Wormald, Number of labeled 4-regular graphs, J. Graph Theory, 4 (1980), 203-212.
formula: Read and Wormald give recurrence relations involving all sequences A005815 and A058830-A058837 (see the Maple program). - _Emeric Deutsch_, Jan 26 2005
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 05 2001
